item.description:
Are you a night owl? Do you enjoy trivia? Come out and support fellow Newcomer, Ryan, as he hosts Trivia Night at Luxe Burger Bar!

First prize is $30, second prize is $20, and third prize is $10 in gift certificates to be used at a later date. This event starts at 9pm and goes until approximately 11pm.

Let's meet at 8:45pm to see how many tables/teams we need. This place is usually busy!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Ryan in the DJ booth (directly to the right of the entrance) where the Newcomers are sitting
item.name: Trivia @ Luxe Burger Bar
